text:
Pure Storage | Software Engineer, Full Stack | Vancouver Canada | Full-time Onsite http://www.purestorage.com

Pure Storage is looking for skilled full-stack software engineers to join its growing Vancouver, B.C. engineering office.

The interview process typically involves an online quiz, technical phone screen, and one or more on-site interviews.

For more info or to apply: http://grnh.se/26upsj1
